name: bb-better-binding
description: 1 way data binding from javascript controller to html template

scripts.dev: nodemon --watch example --watch src -e html,js --exec npm run build & http-server ./build -o -a localhost -c-1
scripts.build: [ -d build ] && rm -r build; cp -r example build; browserify --debug example/controller.js -o build/controller.js; cp favicon.ico build
scripts.build-docs: [ -d docs ] && rm -r docs; npm run build && cp -r build docs
scripts.postversion: npm run build-docs && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: mahhov
